name: gui
description:
The gui command launches the OSMFast GUI - a tkinter-based graphical interface for building and running osmfast commands.

Features:
- Command browser organized by category
- Interactive command builder with autocomplete
- File browser dialogs for input/output
- Real-time command preview
- Output display with syntax highlighting
- Command history and recent files
- Quick examples for common operations
- Usage examples from documentation
- Related commands navigation
output:
Opens a graphical window with:
- Left panel: Command browser with search
- Right panel: Command builder with arguments
- Bottom: Output display area
- Menu bar: File, Edit, Run, View, Help
